ui.panel.treeViewer
Class StoryMutableTreeNode

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode
      ui.panel.treeViewer.StoryMutableTreeNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javax.swing.tree.MutableTreeNode, javax.swing.tree.TreeNode
public class StoryMutableTreeNode
extends javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode

Clase que sirve como nodo del árbol para mostrar segmentos y relaciones en la vista jerárquica del mito.

Author:
Sergio Gutiérrez Mota e Israel Cabañas Ruiz
See Also:
